name: Brandy Julep
instruction: Same as Mint Julep, but with Brandy.

name: Gin Highball
instruction: Gin and Soda, with Lemon Peel squeezed in glass and a lump of Ice.

name: Gin Julep
note: Prepared the same way as Mint Julep.

name: Gin Smash
note: Prepared the same way as a Brandy Smash.

name: Golden Fizz
note: Similar to Gin Fizz, but with the yolk of a fresh egg added.

name: Orange Squash
instruction: Same as Orangeade but use soda water instead of plain water.

name: Peto Cocktail
instruction: Same as Bronx Cocktail with a dash of Maraschino.
